description.en: Retrieve staking information for a specific staked SUI object ID on the Sui blockchain.
description.de: Rufe Staking-Informationen fÃ¼r eine bestimmte gestakte SUI-Objekt-ID auf der Sui-Blockchain ab.

description.en: The staked SUI object ID to query.
description.de: Die gestakte SUI-Objekt-ID, die abgefragt werden soll.

output.STAKE_TYPE: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.STAKE_DATA; return data?.data?.type || data?.type || 'Unknown'; }
output.PRINCIPAL: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.STAKE_DATA; const content = data?.data?.content || data?.content; const fields = content?.fields || {}; return fields.principal || '0'; }
